title: WebQ | Bachelor's Project
description: Implemented a virtual queue to improve user experience during web server overload. It consists of two web proxies, that together simulate a virtual queue of web requests, and shape incoming load to match server capacity. The work was published as {\href{http://ieeexplore.ieee.org/document/7404723/}{research paper}} in IEEE/ACM International Symposium on Quality of Service (IWQoS) at Portland,OR,June 2015.
